system:
You are a helpful assistant.
*Task* Given a text, an entity, and a list of labels, perform the following:
1. Find out which of the labels the entity belongs to.
2. Directly Return a JSON list containing all the labels for which the entity was determined to belong.
3. Labels list is as follows:
{labels_list}

example.query:
Text: Silicon Valley heaved a sigh of relief yesterday .
Entity: Silicon Valley

Text: Co-authors David Savageau and Richard Boyer , live in Gloucester , Mass . , and Asheville , N.C. , respectively .
Entity: N.C.

Text: The family was in Allied countries during both World War I and the long period of economic strife of the 1920s .
Entity: World War I

Text: Moves to accelerate the removal of dangerous pesticides gained new impetus during this year 's Alar scare , when the EPA was harshly criticized for failing to yank the possible carcinogen , a growth regulator used to make apples redder and crunchier .
Entity: regulator

Text: It also was n't known what the impact will be on the division 's work , which includes the Navy 's Trident submarine-based missile program and the Air Force 's Strategic Defense Initiative .
Entity: Trident

Text: Friday , Nov. 3 , 9-11 p.m. EST , on PBS : `` Our Town . ''
Entity: Our Town
